item.description: --- title: "Load a CSV" author: "Puneet Thukral" date: 07/12/2021 draft: false --- # Import Pandas import pandas as pd #Load CSV file into a dataframe with Pandas df = pd.read_csv('data/load_csv_example.csv') #Output Dataframe df # Load a csv file with no headers df = pd.read_csv('data/load_csv_example.csv', header=None) df # Load a csv file with encoding - UTF-8 df = pd.read_csv('data/load_csv_example.csv', encoding='UTF-8') df # Load a csv file with specific column names df = pd.
